entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:46 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 10:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
